804030.name: Football Game - Official Soundtrack
804030.description:
The Official Soundtrack for Football Game, by Jupiter-C


Featuring 9 tracks of original music.

Jupiter-C is Ashiya Eastwood & David Kane

Please note that the physical cassette release via Ramber Records is now sold out.

All tracks written & performed by Jupiter-C
Except track 3. – written by K., Eastwood & Kane
F0RM is K.

Football Game OST produced by Eastwood & Kane and licensed for use by Cloak & Dagger Games
